comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Baron Wakatsuki Reijirō (若槻 禮次郎?, 21 March 1866 – 20 November 1949) was a Japanese politician and the 25th and 28th Prime Minister of Japan. Opposition politicians of the time derogatorily labeled him Usotsuki Reijirō, or "Reijirō the Liar". en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wakatsuki_Reijir%C5%8D

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content:
The two dates on the negative, 6/14/24 and 1/27/26 "to news"
correspond with his June, 1924 appointment as Home Minister and the January, 1926  beginning of his first term as Japan's Prime Minister.
